Otorhinolaryngologic Diseases/Nose Diseases/Paranasal Sinus Diseases/Sinusitis/Ethmoid Sinusitis
Respiratory Tract Diseases/Nose Diseases/Paranasal Sinus Diseases/Sinusitis/Ethmoid Sinusitis
Record.Description: Inflammation of the NASAL MUCOSA in the ETHMOID SINUS. It may present itself as an acute (infectious) or chronic (allergic) condition.
